error_429: Too many requests have been sent from your IP
error_500: Server error, please try again later
error_422: Some values are filled with errors
error_password_length: Password length should be from {{min}} to {{max}} characters
note_create_textarea_description: The note will be encrypted using the AES algorithm and saved on the server in encrypted form. Only the owner of the link with the key will be able to decrypt it.
note_created_alert_save_pass: Don't forget to save the note password
note_created_alert_remove_after_read: The note will be deleted after reading
note_del_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the note?
note_deleted_alert_1: The note has been permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
note_confirmation_alert_remove: After clicking the button, the note will be displayed and then deleted permanently
note_password_alert_remove_1: Do not refresh the page, the note has been deleted from the server.
note_password_alert_remove_2: If you can't remember the password, you won't be able to recover the note.
note_password_pass_error: Password entered incorrectly, please try again
note_view_copy_alert: Copy the note content as it has been deleted
